local_schema.longdesc: The /apps/marco/global_keybindings/run_command_window_screenshot key defines a keybinding which causes the command specified by this setting to be invoked.
The /apps/marco/global_keybindings/run_command_screenshot key defines a keybinding which causes the command specified by this setting to be invoked.

local_schema.short_desc: Commands to run in response to keybindings
local_schema.longdesc: The /apps/marco/global_keybindings/run_command_N keys define keybindings that correspond to these commands. Pressing the keybinding for run_command_N will execute command_N.
